title: Brooklyn Beckham's and ex Hana Cross attend SAME Halloween party
text:
Brooklyn Beckham faced a near-certain run-in with his ex-girlfriend Hana Cross on Thursday night, when they attended the same Halloween party in Beverly Hills.

To make matters all the more awkward for the former flames, Hanna, 22, arrived at the soirée – thrown by socialite Paris Hilton – with new beau Nasser Alfallah, 19.

As the gathering got underway, Hanna and Nasser shared snaps of themselves partying in costume on Instagram, while Brooklyn, 20, kept his night of revelry off social media after making a low-key arrival with a bandanna tied around his face.

Night on the town: Hanna Cross and her new boyfriend Nasser Alfallah attended Paris Hilton's Halloween party in Beverly Hills, California, on Thursday night

The new couple went all out for their night on the town, with British beauty Hana wearing a skimpy American Indian-inspired costume, complete with a headdress.

She teamed her controversial ensemble with a pair of gladiator sandals, while a black leather jacket helped stave off the night chill en route to and leaving the bash.

For his part, Nasser dressed up as a cowboy in a black shirt and matching wide-brimmed hat, which he teamed with a pair of blue embroidered jeans.

On the list: Her arrival at the soirée was made awkward by the fact that her ex Brooklyn Beckham was also among the list of attendees

Stealth: Brooklyn cut a low-key figure, arriving at the bash with a red bandanna around his face

Staying quiet: While Hanna and her new man posted snippets from their night of revelry on Instagram, Brooklyn stayed quiet on his social media account

Arrival: Wearing a pair of weathered Converse hi-tops, the celebrity offspring arrived alone

Meanwhile, Brooklyn was a lot less easy to spot, teaming his red bandanna with a Bob Marley T-shirt, which was ripped under the arms, and black trousers.

Hana's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.

On Tuesday, Hana was seen packing on the PDA with Nasser as they loitered around in a car park outside trendy eatery Nobu with a group of their pals.

Nasser, whose older sister is Mick Jagger's ex Noor Alfallah, gripped her close, as she flaunted her svelte frame in baggy black sweatpants and a matching beanie hat.

Hell for leather: Hana teamed her ensemble with a pair of gladiator sandals, while a black leather jacket helped stave off the night chill en route to and leaving the bash

Inspiration: Nasser attended the bash dressed as a cowboy, while Hana beckoned controversy in a Native American-inspired costume

Loved up: The two appeared to only have eyes for each other as they entered the bash together

Noor, 25, made the headlines when she dated the Rolling Stones star, 76, in 2017 and has since insisted 'age didn't matter' when she dated the rocker - despite their 52-year age difference.

Earlier this year it was reported by the Aspen Times that Nasser was arrested for trespassing in a hotel room during a night out with his friends.

According to a police report, a security guard accidentally let Nasser into the wrong room, and he and a friend jumped up and down on beds where two women were sleeping.

Across town Brooklyn was seen partying with stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn, 21, at a plush Beverly Hills party over the weekend.

Leading: Nasser was again seen leading the way as the pair made their way out of the bash

All that glitters: Hana teamed her barely-there ensemble with a pair of statement necklaces

Getting into character: Nasser sported a black shirt and matching wide-brimmed hat, which he teamed with a pair of blue embroidered jeans

Group of pals: They arrived at the bash among a small group of friends, who also wore costume

Bandanna: In keeping with the theme of his ensemble, Nasser also donned a black bandanna

Photos of Brooklyn, 20, emerged on Tuesday showing the aspiring photographer leaving a mansion party with a gorgeous blonde, who has been identified as rising star Natalie.

The son of Victoria and David looked close with Natalie, who boasts over 40,000 followers on Instagram and a string of acting roles.

This timing of Brooklyn's outing with Natalie crosses over with reports that he is dating brunette actress Phoebe Torrance, 25, who previously worked as his mother Victoria's lookalike.

Hana dated Brooklyn for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting.

Revealed: Hana's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait

Moving on: Hana and Brooklyn were together for nine months (pictured in February)

Last month, they risked an awkward run-in when they both showed up at the same exclusive event in London.

Brooklyn was seen making his way into the LOVE & YouTube Fashion Week party, held at The Standard, within minutes of Hana's arrival.

Their night out at the same soirée came amid reports that Brooklyn kissed another of his exes, Lexy Panterra, while partying in the English capital.

It was also recently reported that Hana was left in tears by ex Brooklyn, after the pair faced an awkward run-in at the Agent Provocateur AW19 campaign launch party.

Rising star: Across town Brooklyn was partying with stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn, 21, at a plush Beverly Hills party over the weekend

Influencer: The son of Victoria and David looked close with Natalie, who boasts over 40k followers on Instagram and a string of acting roles

A source told The Sun that she was consoled by her friends following the tense encounter, and was later seen leaving the party five minutes after Brooklyn.

The source said: 'They were chatting together and it was very tense. By the end of it I could hear Brooklyn say, '"it is what it is".

'He walked off and she went back to her friends looking dejected, but she held it together while her pals comforted her.'
description: Hanna and Nasser shared snaps of themselves partying in costume on Instagram, while Brooklyn, 20, kept his night of revelry off social media at the Paris Hilton-hosted bash in Los Angeles on Thursday.
